assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The datasets used in this study are available at the UK10K Project Consortium (Walter et al. CitationRef removed) (ExternalRef removed) The genetic maps of OMNI data set built by LDhat (Auton and McVean CitationRef removed) were downloaded from the 1000 Genomes Project (ExternalRef removed).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: FastEPRR 2.0 is written in R and integrated on the eGPS cloud (Yu et al. CitationRef removed) (ExternalRef removed). The desktop version and the genetic maps established in this study are freely available on the institute website (ExternalRef removed).
